translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the text of the Paṭṭhāna in pairs,

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)🔽24.17. Saraṇaduka, Hetusahetukadukādi🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu🔽ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke🔽ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi             na saraṇam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ hetu  ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke  ekam pe a vigate dve  na saraṇam na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu
translated: The section on the dyads beginning with the unprompted and the prompted

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽saraṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā🔽dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca 🔽saraṇaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā 🔽dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: With the unprompted and not caused by causes as condition, the prompted and caused by causes dhammas arise.
